title: No Place Like Home
description: Her death will reveal the truth.Savannah awoke in the woods, her skin covered with cuts, blood dripping down her body. But she didn't know what happened. She didn't know why she was there, or why she was bleeding. And she couldn't figure out why she was standing mere feet from her corpse. Everyone thought that she ran away; that she finally hit rock bottom. But Savannah's death will reveal the truth. And some secrets are better left hidden.Please note that "No Place Like Home" is a young adult novella complete at approximately 20,000 words.
author: Nicole Sobon
